info.name: Primewire LetMeWatchThis dark reskin
info.description: Dark theme for Primewire (aka LetMeWatchThis) tv/movies site
info.additionalInfo: Ive done two other scripts for this site, one called Primewire LetMeWatchThis Dark Reskin 2, the other called Ultimate Primewire dark reskin and recommend trying that second one, its a major improvement
